Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will have to cope without Lionel Messi due to an ankle injury.
Alexis Mac Allister is likely out due to a training injury.
Nicolas Tagliafico and Leonardo Balerdi are ruled out through injury.
Valentin Barco is the only natural left-back available.
Cristian Romero and Lisandro Martinez are set to be the preferred center-back partnership.
Enzo Fernandez is available despite singing an offensive song.
Scaloni may select another midfielder or hand a start to an attacker.
Nicolas Gonzalez, Alejandro Garnacho, and Paulo Dybala are among those pushing for a start.
Uncapped quartet Valentin Castellanos, Giuliano Simeone, Matias Soule, and Ezequiel Fernandez will hope to feature.
